argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matbas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | matbas.g | |- G = ( R freeLMod ( N X. N ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_matval | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> A = ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) >. ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Scalar ` A ) = ( Scalar ` ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) >. ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_scaid | |- Scalar = Slot ( Scalar ` ndx ) |
| 7 |  | #P_3re | |- 3 e. RR |
| 8 |  | #P_3lt5 | |- 3 < 5 |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_gtneii | |- 5 =/= 3 |
| 10 |  | #P_scandx | |- ( Scalar ` ndx ) = 5 |
| 11 |  | #P_mulrndx | |- ( .r ` ndx ) = 3 |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_neeq12i | |- ( ( Scalar ` ndx ) =/= ( .r ` ndx ) <-> 5 =/= 3 ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_mpbir | |- ( Scalar ` ndx ) =/= ( .r ` ndx ) |
| 14 | 6, 13 | #P_setsnid | |- ( Scalar ` G ) = ( Scalar ` ( G sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) >. ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 14 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( Scalar ` G ) = ( Scalar ` A ) ) |
